snippet.title: Days of War Early Access Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
This classic fast-paced FPS Days of War just released on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/454350/

Days of War offers a classic style approach to the WW2 shooter genre, re-introducing fast-paced battles ranging from highly tense 12 player firefights to bigger scale 32 player firefights.

Players need to fall back on their marksmanship, skill, map awareness and tactical cunning. Like in true WW2 warfare, combat in Days of War is brutal, unforgiving and requires extensive teamwork.

Make every bullet count, join Days of War!
